Action.author: jastisriradheshyam
Action.body: from sawtooth_sdk.messaging.future import FutureTimeoutError File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/sawtooth_sdk/messaging/future.py", line 20, in from sawtooth_sdk.protobuf import validator_pb2 ImportError: No module named 'sawtooth_sdk.protobuf' {code} *ImportError: No module named 'sawtooth_sdk.protobuf'* but with sawtooth-sdk v1.1.3 code works fine. Reference: 1.1.4 sawtooth-sdk · PyPI|https://pypi.org/project/sawtooth-sdk/1.1.4/ 1.1.3 sawtooth-sdk · PyPI|https://pypi.org/project/sawtooth-sdk/1.1.3/ >

Action.author: pschwarz
Action.body: In preparation for a Sawtooth community transition from JIRA to Github issues, we are reviewing all issues within JIRA. This issue appears to have been addressed in the current stable version of Sawtooth (v1.2), so we are updating its status to done. If you believe this is in error, please help our migration efforts and re-open this issue in Github Issues at https://github.com/hyperledger/sawtooth-core/issues.
